DOC.brief_title: The Combined Effect 2,3-Dimercaptosuccinic Acid Multi-Nutrients Children Lead Poisoning
DOC.criteria: Initial BLLs 100440µg/L Age 36y No two main residence House clean ( lead contaminate ) Normal intake history physical Chelation past 12 week Concomitant Fe deficiency ( ferritin < 16ng/ml ) Hemoglobin < 10.5g/dL Medications affect mineral metabolism
